languages.text: Благородный Космический волк Ульфар обрел в итоге достойную смерть, о которой так мечтал. Он погиб в битве против предавше{mf|го|й} Всеотца Вольного Торговца, и дух его устремился в Кьялхаллу. Встретил ли он там своих братьев, Зловещий вой, или нет — ведомо лишь павшим.
languages.translation_comment: Ульфар ушел от игрока-хаосита и погиб на Эпитафии

languages.text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar ultimately found the honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with the Rogue Trader, who had betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit soared into Kjalhalla. Whether he met his brothers, the Baleful Howl, there — only the dead know.
languages.original_text: Благородный Космический волк Ульфар обрел в итоге достойную смерть, о которой так мечтал. Он погиб в битве против предавше{mf|го|й} Всеотца Вольного Торговца, и дух его устремился в Кьялхаллу. Встретил ли он там своих братьев, Зловещий вой, или нет — ведомо лишь павшим.

traits.locale_text: Noble Space Wolf Ulfar, in the end, indeed found an honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with a Rogue Trader, who betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit was worthy of venturing into Kjalhalla. If he did meet his brothers, Famehungry, or not — only dead know.

Noble Space Wolf Ulfar, in the end, indeed found an honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with a Rogue Trader, who betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit was worthy of venturing into Kjalhalla. If he did meet his brothers, Famehungry, or not — only dead know.

The noble Space Wolf Ulfar indeed found the honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with a Rogue Trader who betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit was deemed worthy of venturing into Kjalhalla. Whether he met his brothers, the Baleful Howl, or not — only the dead know.

The noble Space Wolf Ulfar indeed found the honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with a Rogue Trader who betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit was deemed worthy of venturing into Kjalhalla. Whether he met his brothers, the Baleful Howl, or not — only the dead know.

The noble Space Wolf Ulfar ultimately found the honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with the Rogue Trader, who had betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit soared into Kjalhalla. Whether he met his brothers, the Baleful Howl, there — only the dead know.

The noble Space Wolf Ulfar ultimately found the honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with the Rogue Trader, who had betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit soared into Kjalhalla. Whether he met his brothers, the Baleful Howl, there — only the dead know.

languages.text: 高贵的太空野狼乌尔法最终得到了他渴望已久的光荣死亡。他与背叛全父的行商浪人开战，在战斗中光荣赴死，他的灵魂进入了卡尔哈拉。至于他是否能见到他的怒嚎者兄弟，恐怕只有死人才知道了。
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar ultimately found the honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with the Rogue Trader, who had betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit soared into Kjalhalla. Whether he met his brothers, the Baleful Howl, there — only the dead know.

traits.locale_text: 高贵的太空野狼乌尔法终于得到了他渴望已久的光荣死亡。他与背叛全父的行商浪人开战，在战斗中光荣赴死。他的灵魂值得进入卡尔哈拉，至于他是否能见到他的渴名者兄弟，恐怕只有死人才知道了。

languages.text: Der edle Space Wolf Ulfar fand letztlich tatsächlich den ehrenvollen Tod, nach dem er sich so gesehnt hatte. Er starb in einem Kampf mit {mf|dem Freihändler, der|der Freihändlerin, die} den Allvater verraten hatte, und seine Seele stieg nach Kjalhalla auf. Ob er dort seinen Brüdern von den Baleful Howl begegnet ist oder nicht, das wissen nur die Toten.
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar ultimately found the honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with the Rogue Trader, who had betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit soared into Kjalhalla. Whether he met his brothers, the Baleful Howl, there — only the dead know.

traits.locale_text: Der edle Space Wolf Ulfar fand tatsächlich den ehrenvollen Tod, nach dem er sich so gesehnt hatte. Er starb in einem Kampf mit {mf|dem Freihändler, der|der Freihändlerin, die} den Allvater verraten hatte, und seine Seele wurde für würdig befunden, nach Kjalhalla zu reisen. Ob er seinen Brüdern von den Baleful Howl begegnet ist oder nicht, das wissen nur die Toten.

languages.text: Le noble Space Wolf Ulfar connut la mort honorable qu'il appelait tant de ses vœux. Il périt en affrontant {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} qui avait trahi le Père de Tous et son esprit s'envola vers Kjalhalla. Seuls les morts savent s'il y retrouva ses frères des Hurleurs sanguinaires.
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar ultimately found the honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with the Rogue Trader, who had betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit soared into Kjalhalla. Whether he met his brothers, the Baleful Howl, there — only the dead know.

traits.locale_text: Le noble Space Wolf Ulfar connut la mort honorable qu'il espérait tant. Il périt en affrontant {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} qui avait trahi le Père de Tous et son esprit fut jugé digne de rejoindre Kjalhalla. Seuls les morts savent s'il y retrouva ses frères des Hurleurs sanguinaires.

languages.text: El noble Lobo Espacial Ulfar encontró finalmente la muerte honorable que tanto deseaba. Cayó en la lucha con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente que había traicionado al Padre de todas las cosas, y su espíritu ascendió al Kjalhalla. Si allí encontró a sus hermanos del Aullido Torvo... solo lo saben los muertos.
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar ultimately found the honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with the Rogue Trader, who had betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit soared into Kjalhalla. Whether he met his brothers, the Baleful Howl, there — only the dead know.

traits.locale_text: El noble Lobo Espacial Ulfar encontró finalmente la muerte honorable que tanto deseaba. Cayó en la lucha con un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente que había traicionado al Padre de todas las cosas, y su espíritu se consideró digno de entrar en el Kjalhalla. Si allí encontró a sus hermanos del Aullido Torvo o no... solo lo saben los muertos.

languages.text: 気高きスペースウルフであるウルファーは、最期に念願の名誉ある死を遂げた。彼は全知の父を裏切った自由開拓者との戦いで死に、その魂はクジャルハラに昇って行いった。彼がそこで仲間である破滅の咆哮の群れに会えたかどうかを知るものは…死者のみである。
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar ultimately found the honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with the Rogue Trader, who had betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit soared into Kjalhalla. Whether he met his brothers, the Baleful Howl, there — only the dead know.

traits.locale_text: 気高きスペースウルフであるウルファーは、最期に念願の名誉ある死を遂げた。彼は全知の父を裏切った自由開拓者との戦いで死に、その魂はクジャルハラに昇って行いった。彼がそこで仲間である破滅の咆哮の群れに会えたかどうかを知るものは…死者のみである。

languages.text: Asil Uzay Kurdu Ulfar, aradığı onurlu ölümü nihayetinde buldu. Yücebaba'ya ihanet eden Hür Tacir ile savaşırken göçtü ve ruhu, Kjalhalla'ya yükseldi. Orada kardeşleriyle, Uğursuz Uluma'yla bir araya gelip gelmediğini ise yalnızca ölüler bilir.
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar ultimately found the honourable death he so longed for. He died in a fight with the Rogue Trader, who had betrayed the Allfather, and his spirit soared into Kjalhalla. Whether he met his brothers, the Baleful Howl, there — only the dead know.

traits.locale_text: Asil Uzay Kurdu Ulfar, aradığı onurlu ölümü nihayetinde buldu. Yücebaba'ya ihanet eden Hür Tacir ile savaşırken öldü ve ruhu Kjalhalla'ya yükseldi. Orada kardeşleriyle, Uğursuz Uluma'yla bir araya gelip gelmediğini ise yalnızca ölüler bilir.

languages.translation_comment: Ульфар ушел от игрока-хаосита и погиб на Эпитафии
